name: Kraftstoff
tagline: An iOS app to track your fuel economy.
body:
# Kraftstoff

Kraftstoff offers you an uncluttered and elegant way to track your car's fuel economy.

## Cars

Supports multiple vehicles.

## Fill-Up

* On each refuel simply enter distance driven, unit price and amount of fuel.
* Fuel data can be added and edited afterwards.
*â€ƒPartial fill-ups are supported (the data is settled on next full fill-up).

## Graphical Display

Select a car and turn your iPhone into landscape mode to get interactive history charts for milage, fuel cost per liter/gallon and km/mile as well as a table with interesting statistical values.

## Data Import and Export

Export of data is supported via email or by forward to CSV-compatible other apps like Numbers. Your data is exported in a simple and human-readable CSV-format. Reimport of data is possible via "Open in" of iOS, e.g. for mailed attachments in your mail client.

[Buy Kraftstoff on the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/app/id471634654)
